title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Wiki-Based Collaborative English Writing Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level basic English grammar and writing experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Complete a 2-page A4 English essay through a 5-stage wiki-based collaborative process (planning-drafting-feedback-revision-final submission)
Revise and improve writing drafts based on peer feedback at least three times
Collaboratively author English documents on a consistent theme per group using real-time collaboration features on a wiki platform
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
